name: Tale of the Red Fang
description:
The Tale of the Red Fang is a sci-fi visual novel game set in a post-apocalyptic version of Earth after a cataclysmic global disaster. The story follows the Red Fang (A.K.A. Sebastian), a man who had his brain transferred into a dog and became an infamous mercenary leader; after his gang abandons whilst travelling through the Sahara Desert, he must survive and escape his hopeless circumstances all the while trying to get to Casablanca to visit the gravesite of his beloved.

Set over the course of two days, players will accompany Sebastian on his bizarre adventure and control the decisions he must make. Players will choose between a variety of choices with two main branching narrative paths that will lead them to encounter a strange assortment of characters and situations.

Gather around folks and listen to the tale of the (not so) legendary Red Fang! But this is only the beginning of his real adventure…though that story is for another day.
